name: Global Webinar On Neurology And Mental Disorders
content: Fratun Meetings extends you the enormous pleasure and the honor of inviting you to attend Global Webinar on Neurology and Mental Disorders (GWNMD-2022) which will be held during 09-10, March 2022\. The theme of the virtual event is “Exploring recent Neuro Science and Mental Disorders, innovations for a better life in the wake of a Pandemic”. The main intention behind the GWNMD-2022 is to bring together renowned doctors, scientists, researchers, and scholars from all over the world to exchange their ideas, present sophisticated research works, and discuss the latest advancements in the field of Neurology and Mental Disorders.
